Name Cannot be empty Name should contain alphabets only Invaild phone number Successfully Registered ABOUT IHMA REGISTER NUMBER: 64/04 IHMA - The National Platform of Indian Homoeopaths is relentless in its efforts to raise the standards of Homoeopathic Education and Practice in India. \n\n IHMA serve the human society by awarding the benefits of homoeopathic system of treatment to public, especially the low socio-economic groups by conducting regular medical camps and fight to maintain the honor and dignity of the profession. Conducts regular CMEs, leadership training programmes, faculty and clinical training , PSC, UPSC and PG Entrance coaching, conferences, newsletters and magazines along with integrated medical research.\n\n It has fought tooth and nail many absurd decisions of the authorities concerned and this way gained maximum acceptance among the homoeopathic community which is evident from the growth it achieved along the length and breadth of India.
INTRODUCTION TO HOMOEOPATHY EDUCATIONAL SERIES Since its inception, IHMA took firm stand against the corruption and nepotism that were prevalent in the Central Council of Homoeopathy at the time. The corruptions were so gross that there were even vigilance cases against some of the top office bearers of the CCH. As a result of the complaints filed by the IHMA before the enquiry commission led by Honourable Justice Usha Verma, the then CCH were dismissed and new members were elected. HISTORY OF IHMA It has fought tooth and nail many absurd decisions of the authorities concerned and this way gained maximum acceptance among the homeopathic community which is evident from the growth. To see more details.. IHMA GALLERY
- To serve the human society by awarding the benefits of Homoeopathic System of treatment to public, especially the low socio-economic groups. - To improve the quality of Homoeopathic Medical Practice. - To improve the quality of Homoeopathic Medical Education. - To maintain the honour and dignity and to uphold the interest of the profession of Homoeopathic Practice and to promote cooperation amongst the members thereof. - To work for the abolition of fake Homoeopathic Practices. - To achieve welfare of qualified Homoeopathic Doctors. - To stand for integrated medical research in Homoeopathy. - To conduction medical camps, especially in epidemics affected areas. - To promote and advance Homoeopathic System of Medicine and allied sciences and to benefit and improve public health thereby.
Terms and Conditions and Cancellation and Refund policy The fees collected through this mobile application is for obtaining membership to IHMA, (Indian Homeopathic Medical Association), Kerala Chapter, subject to the membership policies and regulations of the IHMA. There are 2 types of membership, as shown below: • Annual and Lifetime • Annual membership fee is Rs 400 and Lifetime fee is Rs 4000. NB: Membership once awarded cannot be cancelled, and no refund is given for approved members as there is no cancellation of life membership. Refund terms: Once the Admin verifies the membership application submitted, then the membership is granted, however if the application is rejected by the association, due to reasons whatsoever, the membership will not be awarded, and fee would be refunded to the applicantbank account within 21 working days. Amount once paid through the payment gateway shall not be refunded other than in any of the following circumstances mentioned below: a. Multiple times debiting of applicant’s Card/Bank Account due to technical error. b. Applicant’s account being debited with excess amount in a single transaction due to technical error. 2. In such cases, excess amount excluding Payment Gateway charges would be refunded to the applicant. 3. If payment being charged on the Customer’s Card/Bank Account but the Membership got rejected due to any reason, the fee would be refunded. a. The applicant will have to make an application(email) for refund along with the transaction number and original payment receipt if any generated at the time of making payments. 4. Any grievance is payment can be notified with transaction date, amount, and reference number to the email secretary@ihmakerala.in.
